snippet.title: The Thin Silence - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Greenlight Campaign: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=719208897

Hey. If you're going back north, can you take this letter? For my uncle, Bacca... If you see him...

- - - - - 

The Thin Silence is an cinematic narrative adventure game with both puzzle and exploration elements. Find creative ways to make your way out of the darkness, uncovering the journey that lead you there and the hope that leads you home.

For more information, visit http://twopm.studio/the-thin-silence and be sure to vote for us on Greenlight!
